SELECT RESERVE.RESERVE_NO AS reserveNo, RESERVE.ADULT_COUNT AS adultCount, RESERVE.CHILD_COUNT AS childCount, RESERVE.TRANSFER AS transfer, RESERVE.SUM_PRICE AS sumPrice, TOURINFO.TOUR_NAME AS tourName, TOURINFO.TOUR_DAYS AS intTourDays, TOURINFO.DEP_DAY AS depDay, DEPARTURE.DEP_NAME AS depName, ARRIVAL.ARR_NAME AS arrName FROM (( RESERVE LEFT JOIN TOURINFO ON RESERVE.TOUR_CODE = TOURINFO.TOUR_CODE) LEFT JOIN DEPARTURE ON TOURINFO.DEP_CODE = DEPARTURE.DEP_CODE) LEFT JOIN ARRIVAL ON TOURINFO.ARR_CODE = ARRIVAL.ARR_CODE WHERE RESERVE.CUSTOMER_CODE = #customerCode# AND TRUNC(TOURINFO.DEP_DAY) >= TRUNC(#today#)
ORDER BY TOURINFO.DEP_DAY ASC, RESERVE.RESERVE_NO ASC
